availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Simpson County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Elvira C. Collins. Father of Francis M. Collins, Samuel A. Collins, William L. Collins, and Mary Collins. Farmer in Logan County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Simpson County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Logan County, District 1, p. 48. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Simpson County, Franklin, p. 146. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Logan County, Hardison, p. 57.
